mapper.select: SELECT EMPLOYEE_ID as 'employeeId', EMPLOYEE_NAME as 'employeeName', DATE_FORMAT( CLAIM_DATE, '%Y-%m' ) as 'claimMonth', SUM( PRICE ) as 'claimAccount' FROM claim WHERE DATE_FORMAT( CLAIM_DATE, '%Y-%m' ) = #{selectedMonth} GROUP BY EMPLOYEE_ID

SELECT EMPLOYEE_ID as 'employeeId', EMPLOYEE_NAME as 'employeeName', DATE_FORMAT( CLAIM_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d' ) as 'claimDate', PRICE as 'price', CLAIM_TYPE as 'claimTypeCode', REMARK as 'remark'
FROM claim WHERE DATE_FORMAT( CLAIM_DATE, '%Y-%m' ) = #{selectedMonth} AND EMPLOYEE_ID = #{employeeId}
